overview: One day can change the course of your whole life. Julian knows that. He lives in a small apartement with his father, who has been drinking ever since the death of his wife. However Julian found stability in his two good friends Andreas and Sophia. One day he suddenly finds something in the park, which he hesitantly takes with him. But he doesn't yet know how this find will drastically change his life. The first film production from 'filmABdate'.
title: Zurück zum Absender
